entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3 except 7 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers or flurries this afternoon. High plus 3 except 7 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 5 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016
